column5: Is the lake level down on Big Vermillion near Hudson? Thanks in advance.
When I left there July 5th the water was down about a half foot, but it was hard to tell. Oh yea the fishing was the best we have had yet! Good luck. Mike Cerett
Thanks for the reply. I prefer to launch in Von Bay and that is plenty shallow when the water is norma. A half foot should be no problem.
